column5: Have never been on Lake Simcoe and would like to fish for perch.  Will be around the south shore or Cooks Bay with 19ft boat, looking for a place to launch and any information to get started.  Not looking for anyones honey hole, just a good place to start.  Thanks
hwy 400 and exit on hwy 89 (cookstown).  Go east on 89 till you hit the water in Gilford, probably 15min drive.  You can launch but will have to park on a side street.
Any other information would be appreciated, are the perch deeper this time of year.  What depth should we be starting at?  Will be there in a week from Thursday.  Thanks.
